constraints: Never store financial data or process payments directly - all payment processing must be handled externally by Stripe and PayPal
All generated content must be 100% original and avoid copying specific creators, song lyrics, trademark phrases, or copyrighted scripts
Feature access must be strictly gated by subscription tier at runtime
Backend must use single-actor architecture with all Motoko logic in main actor file
Frontend must not edit immutable paths (useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor, main.tsx, ui components)
No LLM API integrations (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) - content generation logic must be implemented locally
No real-time features (WebSockets, Socket.io) - standard HTTP request/response only
nonGoals: Integration with third-party social media APIs (Twitter, Instagram, Facebook) for posting
Integration with specific influencer tools or platforms
Video editing or media processing capabilities
Direct social media scheduling or auto-posting
